name: Bezel Engine Archive
summary: A BEA file is a game data archive used by a NintendoWare Bezel Engine video game. It contains game assets that have been compressed so they take up less space within a finalized game file. Nintendo Switch games such as Super Mario Party, Tetris 99, and WarioWare: Get It Together! include BEA files.
